name: EreaDrone
storyline:
The world has a new sport: the Drone Racing Esport.
Discover EreaDrone, the most realistic drone racing game ever made. Race now against other pilots, freestyle in huge environments, and create amazing tracks and maps!

EreaDrone has been thinked to be the best, whilst being easy to use, FPV drone game. The simulator has been developped by pilots, but not only for pilots! For players too.

Play, race and freestyle with your friends, all around the world! Create multiplayer lobbies, or join them, and fly up to 8 pilots simultaneously!

Beginner or experienced real FPV drone pilot? Looking for realism? Try out our realistic physics: you will not even notice you are in a simulator.

With the map editor, create maps and tracks of all kinds, for freestyle and racing! Share them easily with other players with one click!

Fly in many environments! Meadow, carpark, suburb, contruction site, stadium, school, mountains, you choose!
summary: Discover EreaDrone, the most realistic drone racing game ever made. Race now against other pilots, freestyle in huge environments, and create amazing tracks and maps!
